item.title: EKC SILVER 35.O HAS BEEN RELEASED. I HAVE CHANGED THE DEFAULT TO THE 720P FAST PLAY. THE SELECTOR CAN STILL BE USED ANYWHERE HOWEVER AS I KNOW IT WAS VERY POPULAR WITH A LOT OF YOU.
